messages.message: Where are you located? Are you looking to bring an idea to market?
Phoenix. I am working on a meditation site similar to calm.com have you used that service?
Great. I am aware of Calm (I know Alex and the investors who invested in Calm). What are you plans with your version of Calm? At what stage are you at?
We have an audio product, the current site doesn't scale and looks dated. I am working on the new site. We will add journaling tools to engage customers.
What do you think?
what the URL? I would love to give you some feedback.
Thesosmethod.com
Great concept. What's your next step?
User tests, build an app, then scale.
Are you doing all this locally in AZ?
Yes.
I wish you the best.
Thank you. What are you up to?
You're welcome. We're creating a platform to help the real estate community.

I am really interested in real estate. I've done tons of research. Low end housing, escalation, all the banking rules surrounding it. I love it because the cost of real estate is all BS. I think eventually everyone who wants the responsibility of ownership will be priced out of the market entirely.
What have you done with that research? Have you invested or purchased real estate?

I bought a house that is on a cul-de-sac front door facing south west, patio facing north east, away from main roads, hardly any traffic noise, modern 18" tiles throughout house except bedrooms, quartz countertops, newish appliances. Value has increased 100k. Next move either pay off early or buy a second place in Flagstaff using my wife who is not currently on the house so still eligible for FHA.
there you go! Starting to see and appreciate all that real estate has to offer. Good luck
Thank you, you too!
You're welcome and thank you.
